604070.name: OMSI 2 Add-On Luzern - Linie 24
604070.description:
Line 24 leads from the Lucerne main railway station across the lake bridge towards the traffic building to Meggen. At the crossing of the lake, passengers can admire the world-famous "Kapellbrücke" with its striking tower, while some original cargo ships drive tourists across the lake.

At the stop "Schwanenplatz" you will find the famous jeweler shops, which are also a great attraction for Lucerne tourists.

A stop at the Casino-Palace follows at the lake promenade. Afterwards, the route offers the "Oldtimerloks" at the "Verkehrshaus der Schweiz" (Swiss Museum of Transport) for all locomotive fans.

With a total length of 8.4 km, line 24 leads through the rural area towards Seehotel Hermitage and from there to Meggen. Announcements at bus stops ensure more realism.
The interesting and challenging route guidance has been reproduced in detail with many objects and details and offers a lot of fun to all OMSI enthusiasts, with the original replica of the Mercedes-Benz articulated bus O530G Facelift.

Special features of this OMSI 2 add-on are the original textured buildings and objects. Enjoy a ride on line 24 - the first Swiss add-on for OMSI 2!
604070.supported_languages:
德语*, 英语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
